comments.body: Can you also update the versions mentioned a few lines above?
Can I delete them instead? They seem redundant as it's easy to get the current versions by running `sdkmanager --list` and it's (apparently) easy to forget to update this list here.
Yeah, that is good as well. Maybe you can document how to get the latest version from sdkmanager instead?

comments.body: Can you add a note explaining what happens then -- i.e. if a tag still exists and branches are pointing to it, without an artifact existing in cloud storage, will the artifacts automatically get rebuilt and uploaded?
No, nothing will happen unless someone re-runs those builds.  I'll add that info.
